doc.field: 7 1/2 Minute (USGS 1:24,000) Quadrangle and Quarter Quadrangle Boundaries
7 1/2 Minute (USGS 1:24,000) Quadrangle and Quarter Quadrangle Boundaries

This is a basic layer of 7 1/2 minute quadrangle boundaries (quad024k) and quarter quadrangle boundaries (qquad024k) covering the seven county Twin Cities metropolitan area. The dataset includes unique identifiers and quadrangle names.

<?xml version="1.0"?><metadata><idinfo><citation><citeinfo><origin>Metropolitan Council</origin><pubdate>Unpublished material</pubdate><title>7 1/2 Minute (USGS 1:24,000) Quadrangle and Quarter Quadrangle Boundaries</title><mgmg1cid>N/A</mgmg1cid><pubinfo><publish>Metropolitan Council</publish></pubinfo><onlink>ftp://gisftp.metc.state.mn.us/Quadrangles24K.zip</onlink></citeinfo></citation><descript><abstract>This is a basic layer of 7 1/2 minute quadrangle boundaries (quad024k) and quarter quadrangle boundaries (qquad024k) covering the seven county Twin Cities metropolitan area. The dataset includes unique identifiers and quadrangle names.</abstract><purpose>This dataset was created to help track the development and use of orthophotography and other datasets that are tiled by 7 1/2 minute quadrangles.</purpose><supplinf>Twin Cities 7 County Metropolitan Area. This includes the counties of Anoka, Carver, Dakota, Hennepin, Ramsey, Scott and Washington in Minnesota.</supplinf></descript><timeperd><timeinfo><sngdate><caldate>20000101</caldate></sngdate></timeinfo><current>Up to date as of 1/1/2000</current></timeperd><status><progress>Complete</progress><update>As Needed</update></status><spdom><bounding><westbc>-94.012</westbc><eastbc>-92.732</eastbc><northbc>45.415</northbc><southbc>44.471</southbc></bounding></spdom><keywords><theme><themekt>None</themekt><themekey>quadrangle boundaries, quarter quadrangle boundaries, administrative boundaries</themekey></theme><place><placekey>Twin Cities, Anoka County, Carver County, Dakota County, Hennepin County, Ramsey County, Scott County, Washington County</placekey></place></keywords><accconst>None</accconst><useconst>None</useconst><browse><browsen>http://www.datafinder.org/metadata/bg/Quadrangles24K.jpg</browsen><browsed>Sample map showing the Quadrangles24K and QuarterQuadrangles24K layers.</browsed></browse><native>ArcInfo Version 7x, UNIX platform</native><crossref><citeinfo><title>State wide quadrangle boundaries available from DNR</title></citeinfo></crossref><ptcontac><cntinfo><cntperp><cntorg>Metropolitan Council</cntorg><cntper>Jon Hoekenga</cntper></cntperp><cntpos>GIS System Administrator</cntpos><cntaddr><address>390 Robert Street North</address><city>St. Paul</city><state>MN</state><postal>55101-1805</postal></cntaddr><cntvoice>651.602.1561</cntvoice><cntemail>jonathan.hoekenga@metc.state.mn.us</cntemail></cntinfo></ptcontac></idinfo><dataqual><logic>The dataset is topologically 'clean'.</logic><complete>Entire seven county geographic area is covered.</complete><posacc><horizpa><horizpar>The positional accuracy of the dataset has not been tested under the National Standards for Spatial Data Accuracy. The positional accuracy of the dataset is estimated to be 1 meter.</horizpar></horizpa></posacc><lineage><srcinfo><srcscale /></srcinfo><procstep><procdesc>Points for exact 3.25 minute (quarter quad) divisions were created in an Arc coverage in geographic coordinates. The points were connected to make a polygon layer of quarter quadrangle boundaries. This layer was then projected to UTM, Zone 15 and attributes were added.</procdesc></procstep></lineage></dataqual><spdoinfo><indspref>Quadrangle IDs, Quadrangle name</indspref><direct>Vector</direct><mgmg3obj>arcs, nodes, polygons, label points</mgmg3obj><mgmg3til>One layer for entire seven county region.</mgmg3til></spdoinfo><spref><vertdef><altsys><altdatum>Not applicable</altdatum><altunits /></altsys><depthsys><depthdn>Not applicable</depthdn><depthdu /></depthsys></vertdef><horizsys><planar><gridsys><gridsysn>Universal Transverse Mercator</gridsysn><utm><utmzone>15</utmzone></utm></gridsys><planci><plandu>meters</plandu></planci></planar><geodetic><horizdn>NAD83</horizdn><ellips>GRS80</ellips></geodetic></horizsys></spref><eainfo><overview><eaover>Polygon Attributes for quad024k Layer (Quadrangles):
QUADID: Four digit unique 7 1/2 minute quadrangle ID used by Metropolitan Council and many MN state agencies.
DNR24: Old DNR quadrangle ID. Note: DNR and other state agencies now generally uses QUADID.
MGS24: Quadrangle ID developed by the Minnesota Geologic Survey.
USGS24: Quadrangle ID developed by USGS.
MN100: The state agency standard quad ID for the USGS 1:100,000 scale quadrangle within which this 7 1/2 minute quadrangle resides.
QUADNAME: The official USGS name of the quadrangle.
DOQFILE: The name of the USGS DOQ file for this quadrangle.
DOQ97: Is there a 1997 Metropolitan Council orthophoto for this quadrangle (Y or N).
MN24: Identical to QUADID. This is basically an alternate name (for the same ID).
Polygon Attributes for qquad024k Layer (Quarter Quadrangles): (Same as above for the quad024k layer with these additions:)
QQCODE: A code indicating which quarter quadrangle this is. 1 = NE 2 = NW 3 = SW 4 = SE
DOQQFILE: The USGS DOQQ file name.
DOQQYEAR: The year the USGS DOQQ photo was taken.
DOQQEXT: The extension to the DOQ file name to create a DOQQ.</eaover><eadetcit>None</eadetcit></overview></eainfo><distinfo><resdesc>Quadrangles24K</resdesc><distliab>NOTICE: The Geographic Information System (GIS) Data to which this notice is attached are made available pursuant to the Minnesota Government Data Practices Act (Minnesota Statutes Chapter 13).
